channel.title: Need Shop Help
channel.description: Hi, I can't seem to get my shop to work, I add the skillcapes to shop.cfg and only some item ids show up. Here is my shop.cfg line [code]shop = 40 @gre@Skill_Cape_Shop 2 2 10706 10 10715 10 10721 10 10709 10 10712 10 10727 10 10718 10 10724 10 10704 10 10713 10 10719 10 10707 10 10710 10 10725 10 10716 10 10722 10 10705 10 10714 10 10720 10 10708 10 10711 10 10726 10 10717 10 10723 10 10730 10 10742 10 10745 10 10757 10 10751 10 10754 10 10739 10 10733 10 10728 10 10740 10 10743 10 10755 10 10749 10 10752 10 10737 10 10731 10 10729 10 10741 10 10744 10 10756 10 10750 10 10753 10 10738 10 10732 10 [/code] All that shows up in the shop is up to 10724. I want to put all items in the shop. If someone could help me, I'd appreciate it. Thank you[br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2007, 04:33:34 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2007, 04:51:31 PM[/size][hr]I really need help please

item.title: Need Shop Help
item.dc:creator: @fireman7778 fireman7778
item.description:
@fireman7778 wrote:

ur using tabs between item id and how much of it right? also are u compiling?

YOU MUST USE TAB NOT SPACE OR ELSE IT WONT WORK.

just a tip

Read full topic

item.title: Need Shop Help
item.dc:creator: @blakeblake blakeblake
item.description:
@blakeblake wrote:

Hi, I can’t seem to get my shop to work, I add the skillcapes to shop.cfg and only some item ids show up. Here is my shop.cfg line

shop = 40 @gre@Skill_Cape_Shop 2 2 10706 10 10715 10 10721 10 10709 10 10712 10 10727 10 10718 10 10724 10 10704 10 10713 10 10719 10 10707 10 10710 10 10725 10 10716 10 10722 10 10705 10 10714 10 10720 10 10708 10 10711 10 10726 10 10717 10 10723 10 10730 10 10742 10 10745 10 10757 10 10751 10 10754 10 10739 10 10733 10 10728 10 10740 10 10743 10 10755 10 10749 10 10752 10 10737 10 10731 10 10729 10 10741 10 10744 10 10756 10 10750 10 10753 10 10738 10 10732 10
All that shows up in the shop is up to 10724.
I want to put all items in the shop.
If someone could help me, I’d appreciate it.
Thank you[br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2007, 04:33:34 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2007, 04:51:31 PM[/size][hr]I really need help please
